thread.title: Eamonn Holmes roasted on Twitter for his bizarre Sky News interview with Jeremy Corbyn
thread.title_full: Eamonn Holmes roasted on Twitter for his bizarre Sky News interview with Jeremy Corbyn

title: Eamonn Holmes roasted on Twitter for his bizarre Sky News interview with Jeremy Corbyn
text:
Eamonn Holmes roasted on Twitter for his bizarre Sky News interview with Jeremy Corbyn Eamonn Holmes roasted on Twitter for his bizarre Sky News interview with Jeremy Corbyn 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Broadcaster Eamonn Holmes has been blasted on social media following a car crash interview with Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn. 
The bizarre interview on Sky News kicked off with the Irishman, a Manchester United fan, taking a dig at Gooner Jeremy, following Arsenal’s loss against Olympiakos in the Champions League. Labour leader Jeremy Corbyn (Joe Giddens/PA) 
“It wasn’t such a good night for you last night, because I know you’re an Arsenal supporter, but it was all going so well and then look at what happened last night. 
“Every young lad has a dream of appearing in the FA cup final, and scoring the winning goal, and I was looking at you and the love there was for you in the room, and you were basking in it – was yesterday your FA cup final?” 
The 12-minute interview rapidly went downhill from there with Eamonn likening Mr Corbyn’s popularity to that of a “religious leader” before more football analogies followed and a long-winded statement about the Labour man’s “caring” persona. 
The TV star is on social media so our advice is to stay away for today and don’t read the comments. Eamonn had “a shocker” 
— Jack Nield (@JackNield) September 30, 2015 Eamonn Holmes interviewing Jeremy Corbyn was really, really odd http://t.co/oe8fT4hw78 pic.twitter.com/bcVgyzgwFX 
— Chris York (@ChrisDYork) September 30, 2015 Where the hell did Eamonn Holmes go to journalism school? Was he taught by Katie Hopkins? http://t.co/dAviYGzOei
